name: R E F R A C T I O N
name_original: R E F R A C T I O N
description:
Hey there,

This is a game I made in weeks. I had some help from Clink. (thank you Clink)

It's an arcade bullethell game.  Enjoy...or not ^-^

And the controls are:
WASD = move
LMB = Dash
Press Space = Store Bullets 
Release Space = Shoot Stored Bullets

SPECIAL THANKS TO FIERYPENGUIN FOR HIS AWESOME MUSIC!

I'm currently making another short game. If you want to support me or learn more about it check my Patreon or join my Discord server: https://discord.gg/ceqfCKb 

Follow me on Twitter: TheLaZeus
